payload.text: To register for BT Panorama, an email address and Australian mobile number are required to complete various security checks. For this reason, all clients registering for BT Panorama must have an email address and Australian mobile number.
To chat with one of our consultants, You can call 1300 881 716 (or +612 9155 4029 outside Australia) from 8:30am to 6:30pm, Monday to Friday (Sydney time) and a consultant will assist you.
